bibl.title: The History of the Library in Western Civilization. Translated by Timothy CULLEN. (From Minos to Cleopatra. The Greek World from the Minoans' Archival Libraries to the Universal Library of the Ptolemies. I.)
bibl.note: A paru conjointement aux États-Unis: New Castle, Delaware, Oak Knoll Press, 2004, 4°, 374 pp., figg. ISBN 1-584-56114-9. $75. - Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 184.

STAIKOS Konstantinos S., The History of the Library in Western Civilization. Translated by Timothy CULLEN. (From Minos to Cleopatra. The Greek World from the Minoans' Archival Libraries to the Universal Library of the Ptolemies. I.)
't Goy-Houten, Hes & de Graaf, 2004, 4°, 374 pp., figg. ISBN 90-6194-239-X. €79,50.
